headline: Emerson appoints LifeSight as master trust provider
summary: LONDON, Aug. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LifeSight, WTW’s UK defined contribution (DC) master trust, has been appointed by advanced electronics company, Emerson, to cover all active, deferred and drawdown members. Emerson appointed LifeSight as its full master trust provider in October 2024, having originally engaged LifeSight to provide Drawdown solutions in 2020. LifeSight went live to Emerson members on 1st February this year and all asset transfers were completed by April. LifeSight’s appoi
